channel.title: Cruelty... why?
channel.description:
Guillermo Habacuc Vargas paid 2 kids to catch the dog in the video for him and then used the dog as "art". Not allowing anyone feed the dog, he calls himself a great artist. Unfortunately, the little dog died because of this little jewass homo. Oh my allah!!1++11+1+
"According knew the dog died the next day for lack of food. During the inauguration knew that the dog was chased in the afternoon between the houses of aluminum and cardboard for a district of Managua with the name of a saint who could not say that Habakkuk at the time. There were five children of those who helped in the capture, who received bonuses of 10 cÃ³rdobas comfortable for your cooperation. During the exhibition some people called for the release of the puppy, so that the "artist" was refused. The name of the dog was Natividad, and he was left to die of starvation in the face of all, as if the death of a poor dog was a shameless media show in which nobody does nothing but applaud or look puzzled."
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0cBBudN0_-E&feature=re
Sign the petition, 1,3million people have already. This thing really touches me, I rarely feel sorry for anybody.

item.title: Cruelty... why?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Mopman my friend’s friend has a pet pig. And she also trained her rabbit to be exactly like a dog/cat.

If I had to choose between breaking some guys arm, or breaking a dogs arm, I’d definitely break the dudes arm. I just can’t hurt a dog or most other animals.

If I ever saw someone brutally torturing a dog I’d really lose it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cruelty... why?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Dogs are domesticated, you get a bond with it.

I know people that have pet chickens? And Pigs are pretty damn smart - at least as smart as dogs, if not moreso. Could you bond with a pig?

Read full topic

item.title: Cruelty... why?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:35, topic:210518”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=277380.msg2261800#msg2261800 date=1212806417]

almost made me cry in that video about the dogs getting killed and turned into food by koreans :’(

Are you a vegetarian?
[/quote]no, do you want to see a dogs and cats slaughtered?

No, I was just wondering why its ok for you to eat chicken, fish and suchlike but the idea of someone eating a dog makes you cry?[/quote]

Dogs are domesticated, you get a bond with it.

IDK why I didn’t see it yesterday, but I agree that that asshole has to be punished severely.

Read full topic

item.title: Cruelty... why?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Mopman:

In my opinion, a dog is not equal to a human. I do not see killing a dog equal to murder.

Really? Because I honestly don’t give a shit when someone gets murdered, but this is pretty gay and horrible. I guess it’s because that dog really can’t help itself. (If a person can’t they are retarded).

item.title: Cruelty... why?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Personally I don’t consider eating animals to be cruelty, just nature. Big cats eat gazelles all the time. We are the big cats, the pigs/sheep/cows/chickens/DOGS/CATS are our gazelles. And I LIKE cats (Don’t know what they taste like, though)

item.title: Cruelty... why?
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:

almost made me cry in that video about the dogs getting killed and turned into food by koreans :’(

Are you a vegetarian?
[/quote]no, do you want to see a dogs and cats slaughtered?

No, I was just wondering why its ok for you to eat chicken, fish and suchlike but the idea of someone eating a dog makes you cry?[/quote]WELL THEY’RE GOOD

i still cry, mainly because i have a dog, and i’ve been with him all my life. and i see this video and see a dog that looks like mine (golden retriever) hung by a rope gasping for air, so i x’d out and grabbed my dog and started crying.
